description.value: This ValueSet lists the allowed values for setting "Primary Language" and "Secondary Language" in Sara Alert. Either the "Code" value or the "Display" value may be used. In cases where the 2-letter ISO 639-1 code is listed, the corresponding 3-letter ISO 639-2 code may also be used.
